Metadata.title: Mathurin Sekine
Metadata.description: Fullstack developer, specializing in React, Next.js, and modern web technologies.

intro.title: About me
intro.greeting: I’m Mathurin Sekine, a fullstack developer currently open to new opportunities.
intro.experience: Previously, I worked as a frontend developer at <juisci>Juisci</juisci>, where I contributed to building and improving their web app. I recently earned my diploma in Application Design and Development (Bachelor’s level) from <ada>Ada Tech School</ada>.
intro.project: While I search for my next role, I’m actively working on a personal project called [project name].
intro.skills: My skill set includes frontend technologies like React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, as well as backend frameworks such as Express.js and Nest.js. I'm also comfortable using design tools like Figma, and I am capable of contributing to every stage of a project — from concept and UI design to backend architecture and implementation.
intro.contact: If you think I’d be a great fit for your team, feel free to reach out via <linkedin>LinkedIn</linkedin>, <twitter>Twitter</twitter>, or <mailto>email</mailto>. You can also check out my <cv>CV</cv> and <github>GitHub</github> for more about my experience and work.
intro.more: If you want to see a little more about me, <canvas>visit this page</canvas>.
